Candles: Candles are a timeless and simple solution to provide light in a room. They can be placed in various locations around the room to create a warm and inviting atmosphere.
Glow-in-the-dark furniture: Glow-in-the-dark furniture is a unique and modern solution to provide light in a room. It can be used as a decorative element to add a touch of magic to any space.
Fireflies: Fireflies are a natural source of light that can be used to light up a room at night. They can be attracted to a room by using a light source such as a flashlight or candles.
Solar-powered lanterns: Solar-powered lanterns are a sustainable and eco-friendly solution to provide light in a room. They can be charged during the day and used at night to light up a room.

Bioluminescent plants: Bioluminescent plants are a unique and natural solution to provide light in a room. They can be placed in various locations around the room to create a calming and relaxing atmosphere.
